entry.title: New release for Koel: v7.4.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: edit albums by @phanan in https://github.com/koel/koel/pull/1925
  • fix: broken auditable type by @phanan in https://github.com/koel/koel/pull/1927

Full Changelog: https://github.com/koel/koel/compare/v7.4.0...v7.4.1

entry.title: New release for Koel: v7.4.2

entry.title: New release for Koel: v7.5.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat (plus): file-based media browser (closes #1919) by @phanan in https://github.com/koel/koel/pull/1931 (See Documentation)
  • fix: empty recently played song list in e45689283e9691f9601df4d523fe28e20526da39
  • fix: song list sorting in 4d5ad8d3939341285a1bf811a43dcdc7926b1d27

Full Changelog: https://github.com/koel/koel/compare/v7.4.2...v7.5.0
